idea-plugin.name: Touch Scroll
idea-plugin.description:
TouchScroll

for the IntelliJ IDE Adds the option to scroll with touch screen finger dragging for the whole IDE, simply. This is thought to be most useful for viewing source files comfortably.
First select the corresponding entry in context menu to activate this plugin. You may disable it every time the same way.
Tap once for inserting text. Drag to scroll. Do multiple taps for different selection types.

This is an early version - please report bugs and respond your personal user experience.

action.description: Toggle touch scroll in editor view to simply scroll files with dragging motion.
